Html:
Hello, first of all thanks for the nice piece of code.

I am using the latest version of the control for my application where I show building structure on top of the map as separate layer. For this task I have integrated an custom MapType, where the maxZoom ist set to 25 and the URL to my local tile server, which is able to provide the max zoom level. I tested the zoom levels with openlayers and it works fine. 

The test with GMap failed due to integer overflow ( see: http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/246078 ) on zoom level 23.

I want to ask if there are plans to fix this?
yes, just that the progress is slow due masochistic society i live in ;}
i managed to finally fixed it, you can test it using latest changeset
